metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_e8f0cf54
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_e8f0cf54.pdf

content: 同学们，欢迎你们来到英语学习课堂！ 同学们已经学习了一些英语，从现在开始要进入一个新的学习阶段。 在低年级学习阶段，我们通过有趣的听做、说唱、玩演等活动来学习英语；到了中高年级，课本中将逐步增加读和写的活动，以此来进一步培养我们读写英语的能力。 在本册课本中，同学们将学习到更多的用英语表达人物相貌、中外食品、日常活动、兴趣爱好、农历春节等的方法。学习的知识更多了，要求也更高了，因此同学们要更努力地多听、多读。除了在课堂上按照老师的指导，一步步学习，也可以好好利用课余时间，看看英语动画片或者英语原版图画书等，在丰富多样的英语环境中，学会正确的语音、语调，增强语感。 学习英语应该是一个自然和快乐的过程。积极地参与到生动、 活泼的英语学习中来吧，不知不觉中，你会发现自己能用英语做很多事情啦！ 坚持听说，大胆玩演，积极读写。让我们一起努力吧！ 你们的大朋友：小学《英语》教材编写组

content: 1 PB Let’s Listen and Say Good morning, Peter. Nice to see you again. Good morning, Lingling. Nice to see you, too. We have a new Chinese teacher this year. She’s not tall. She has short hair. What does she look like? I guess she’s tall and has long hair. She has a round face and big eyes. But I think she’s short. She has short hair and small eyes. 1 2 3 4 But she’s beautiful. What does she look like? Unit 3 2 Let’s Learn Let’s Practise What does he look like? My Chinese teacher is Mr Yang. long hair He’s tall. He has small eyes and… That’s Mr Yang. What does he/she look like? He/She is tall. He/She has small eyes. round face tall short young old

content:
3 2 Let’s Read What does she look like? Face Hair Nose Eyes Nancy’s maths teacher Jane’s English teacher Dear friend, I’m in London. I’m a student in Sunshine School. I like my maths teacher. She’s tall and beautiful. She has long hair. She has big eyes and a round face. She’s very kind. This is her photo. Yours, Nancy Dear Nancy, I’m in Beijing. I study in Garden School. I like my English teacher. She has a nice nose and small eyes. She has short black hair. She’s not very tall. She likes reading. Here is her photo. Yours, Jane 
5 4 Let’s Have Fun Let’s Write Let’s rhyme. Michael is nice and tall. He plays in the hall. He plays football. He plays basketball. Michael is our teacher. We listen to his call. 1. Wh at’s your English teacher’s name? My English teacher’s name is . 2. What does your English teacher look like? He/She is . He/She has hair. He/She has face. He/She has eyes. Write about your English teacher.

Tim is eating a delicious ice cream. Dino asks for some and Tim agrees. Write and draw. What would you like for lunch? 1 2 3 4 Draw here:

Do you want some soup, Anne? Yes, please, Mrs Chen. No, Mum. I want some more vegetables, please. 1 2 3 4 Here you are. Thank you, Mum. Do you want some rice?

content:
11 10 Let’s Read Lingling has dinner with her father and mother. Her dog sits under the table. “Do you want some noodles, Lingling?” her mother asks. “Yes, please, Mum.” Her mother gives her some noodles, and she gives some to her dog. The dog is happy. “Do you want some pepper?” her father asks. “Yes, Dad. Thank you,” Lingling says. And her father gives her some pepper. She gives some to her dog. The dog is not happy. Answer the questions. 1. Where is Lingling’s dog? 2. Does her dog like the noodles? 3. Does her dog like the pepper? 1 2 3 4 
13 12 13 12 Let’s Write Let’s Have Fun I want some . Mmm… It’s nice! Do you ? Here you are. some more, please. Here you are. Yes, please. 1 2 3 4 Role play. Place your order. What would you like? I’d like rice, chicken and vegetables, please.

Let’s Learn Let’s Practise 23 22 Can I have a cat? Yes, you can. No, you can’t. pet rabbit basket hold 
Let’s Read 23 22 This is a pet shop. “Can I have a pet, Dad?” Jane asks. “Yes, you can,” her father says. Jane chooses a beautiful parrot. She and her father go home with the parrot. They are very happy. The parrot can talk. He talks to Jane every day. But he is not nice to Jane’s mother. Her mother is not happy. ”Can you take it back to the pet shop?” She asks Jane. True or false? 1. Jane wants a pet shop. 2. Jane likes the parrot. 3. The parrot is very beautiful. 4. The parrot can talk. 5. Jane’s mother likes the pet.

27 26 Let’s Read Answer the questions. 1. Whose cap is too big? 2. Whose coat is nice and thin? 3. What does Liu Li not like? 4. What does Zhou Jie like? Liu Li has new clothes, too. The coat is nice and thin. The hat is pretty. The skirt is beautiful. But she doesn’t like the shoes. They’re too big. Zhou Jie has new clothes. But he doesn’t like some of them. The coat is too long. The cap is too big. The scarf is too short. He likes the jeans and the shoes. They’re very cool and nice.

content: 29 28 Let’s Know More My pet Mr Wang lives in Beijing. He has a pet bird. It is a Huamei . It is lively and can sing a beautiful song. Mr Wang takes his bird to the park every morning. In England, Carrie has a lamb as her pet. A lamb is a baby sheep. The lamb is two months old. Carrie and her brother feed it with milk and often play with it. Tina lives in New York. She has a pet dog. Her little dog has many nice clothes and a nice bed. Tina often takes her dog for a walk in the park. Alan lives in Australia. He has a pet pony. A pony is a small horse. I want the short one. 
33 32 Unit Let’s Listen and Say Hi, can I ask you some questions? What time do you get up? I get up at 6:50. I have breakfast at 7 o’clock. What time do you go to school? I go to school at 7:30. I go home at 4:00 p.m. What time do you have English? I have English at 9:20. I go to bed at 9:30 p.m. What time do you go to bed? What time do you go home? Here you are. This timetable is about your day. What time do you have breakfast? Yes. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 What time do you get up?

metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_e8f0cf54.pdf

content:
Let’s Learn Let’s Practise 35 34 What time do you get up? I get up at 6:30. computer lesson PE maths music Zhenzhen, what time do you have your computer lesson? Jane, what time do you have your dinner? I have dinner at 7:00 p.m. 1 2 art get up go to bed I have my computer lesson at 9 o’clock. 
Let’s Read 35 34 Mary’s father gets up at 6 o’clock. He drives to work at 7 o’clock. He eats breakfast in his office at 7:40 a.m. After that, he reads his letters. At 9:00 a.m., he begins to work on his computer. He has lunch in the dining hall at 12:00 p.m. He does not have a rest. He works on his computer again at 1:30 p.m. He works the whole afternoon till 6:30 p.m. He has his dinner in the office. He works again at 7:00 p.m. He goes home at 11:00 p.m. He reads for about twenty minutes. He usually goes to bed at 11:40 p.m. He works too hard! Number the pictures.

I help my mother. water the plants. make the bed wash the vegetables water the plants iron the clothes clean the windows What do you do at home? NAME: CLASS: GRADE: DATE: What do you do at home? 1. 2. 3. 4. water the plants cook a meal I water the plants. 
Let’s Read 39 38 What does Lanlan’s family usually do at home? Lanlan’s mother Lanlan’s father Lanlan Every child in Sunshine School helps his parents at home. I want to be a good child, so I help my parents every day. My mother irons the clothes. I help her. My father waters the plants. I help him. I make the bed and sweep the floor. I often help Mum when she cooks. We work together and we are happy.

I like reading. I like swimming. 
43 42 I am Tom. Everyone in my family has a hobby. My father likes collecting stamps and he has a lot of stamps from other countries. My mother likes reading. She collects books. My grandpa has many old clocks and watches. He likes collecting old things. Grandma likes vases. She collects many old vases. I like stickers. So you can see books, stamps, clocks, watches, vases and stickers in my house. Tom’s family member Hobby Grandpa Grandma Father Mother Tom True or false? 1. Tom likes stamps. 2. 51 50 Do not smoke. talk. Match and say. Do not use a mobile phone. Do not pick flowers. Do not park here. Do not smoke here. Do not eat or drink here. Do not spit. Do not turn left. Do not use a mobile phone. Let’s Learn Let’s Practise Do not smoke. Do not spit. 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. Do not talk. Do not fish. 
51 50 It’s Saturday. Tim cycles to town with Dino. They go to a carpark. Tim looks for a toilet. Tim wants to park his bicycle, but he sees a sign. It says “No bicycles”. They then cycle to a park. There are a lot of pretty flowers there. Dino wants to pick one. But they see a sign. It means “No picking flowers”. Dino cannot pick a flower. They go to a cinema. They see a sign. It says “No pets”. “Am I a pet?” Dino asks. “No. You’re my friend,” Tim answers. True or false? 1. Dino cycles with Tim. 2. Dino wants to pick flowers. 3. Dino goes to a cinema. 4. Dino thinks he is a pet. 5. Tim thinks Dino is a pet. Let’s Read What do the signs mean?

content:
Unit The Spring Festival Let’s Listen and Say 57 56 The Spring Festival is an important festival in China. People go home to join their families. Mrs Zhang is very busy. She’s cooking for her family and relatives. All of her relatives meet at her house for dinner on the eve of the Spring Festival. They have a big and delicious meal together. This is the reunion dinner. Children enjoy the Spring Festival most. They wear new clothes. They get red packets from their parents and relatives. In the evening, they light firecrackers. During the day, they watch lion dances. They have great fun. 
59 58 eve of the Spring Festival firecrackers red packet lion dance a family reunion dinner What do you do during the Spring Festival? Talk with your friends. Children wear new clothes. get red packets. Do you get red packets? I get red packets from my parents and relatives. Yes, I do. Let’s Learn Let’s Practise

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_e8f0cf54
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_e8f0cf54.pdf

content: 59 58 It is the Spring Festival. We also call it the Lunar New Year. People buy flowers and put them in their homes. They cook delicious food for the family. They also light firecrackers. When friends meet, they wish each other happiness and good luck. Their guests have nice food and drinks. The older people give red packets to the children. What do people do during the Spring Festival? They buy . They give . They cook . They light . True or false? During the Spring Festival, 1. people light firecrackers. 2. people have good food and drinks. 3. people grow flowers at home. 4. children get red packets. Let’s Read

content:
60 D U RING THE SPRING FESTIVAL 1. Do you usually sing and dance? 2. Do you usually have a party with your friends? 3. Do you usually have a big dinner? 4. Do you visit your friends or relatives? 5. Do you stay at home and play games? 6. Do you enjoy yourself? During the Spring Festival we usually Read the questions. Write about your Spring Festival. Let’s Have Fun Let’s Write Let’s chant. It’s a time of joy. It’s a time to enjoy. “Gongxi!”“Gongxi!” we will say To each other in this way. Happy songs we hear, Songs of joy from far and near. 
61 Let’s Know More During the Spring Festival There are spring flowers in my home. My parents give me some lucky money. I’m so happy! At night, I light up two big, red lanterns. We can enjoy the fireworks. I paste the paper-cuts on windows.

metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_e8f0cf54.pdf

content: 65 64 Let’s Read More Stories Stories from from Around Around the the World World This is a story from the old days in China. People say there is a monster . It has strong arms to catch people. It has a big mouth and sharp teeth to eat them. They call it, Nian . Everyone is afraid of it. At night, the people close all their doors and windows. One day, a teacher says, “Listen to me. Nian is afraid of the red colour. Let’s put red paper on our doors, windows and walls. We can also make lots of firecrackers.” At that night, Nian comes. It sees red lanterns at every home. The people light firecrackers. The noise makes Nian so afraid. It runs away and doesn’t come back again. The people are happy. They call that day their New Year. The Story of Nian Activity I like to eat children. monster Guess, Chec k and Learn monster sharp afraid close lantern Draw and colour a picture of Nian . Tell us about your monster. • How many legs

content: PB 66 Let’s Read More Stories Stories from from Around Around the the World World On a farm, a duck feels cold. It makes a small fire to keep warm . On the grass, a rabbit feels cold, too. It comes to sit by the fire with the duck. “This fire is too small. Let’s make it big. We will be warm,” says the rabbit. The fire asks, “Do you want a big fire? ” The two animals say, “Yes!” A monkey is sitting in a tree. It tells them, “Don’t listen to the fire!” They don’t listen to him. They make the fire big. Soon the fire gets too big. The grass is on fire . The farm is on fire. The monkey jumps away, but the duck and the rabbit cannot run away. A Big Fire Activity fire keep warm is on fire Guess, Chec k and Learn Fire can do good and bad things. Write G for the good things. Write B for the bad things. fire A b ig f ire m akes you r un. Fire! Fire! Help! Run! The lesson in the story is, “A small fire makes you warm. A big fire makes

content: G for the good things. Write B for the bad things. fire A b ig f ire m akes you r un. Fire! Fire! Help! Run! The lesson in the story is, “A small fire makes you warm. A big fire makes you run.”

Yes. Here you are. Can I use your English book Chinese book dictionary eraser marker glue , please? Yes. Here you are.

content:
77 76 U nit 5 U nit 6 Can I have a pet ? a rabbit ? a basket ? Yes, you can. No, you can’t. Which one do you want? I want the thick one. the thin one. Which one do you want, the thick one or the thin one? The thick one, please. Mum, can I have a pet? 
77 76 U nit 7 U nit 8 What time do you get up? I get up at 6:50. What time do you get up? have breakfast? have your computer lesson? go to bed? Her mother cooks a meal. She helps her. Lingling’s mother Lingling’s father cooks a meal . irons the clothes. makes the bed. waters the plants. cleans the windows. She helps her. him. I get up have breakfast have my computer lesson go to bed at 6:50. at 7:00. at 9:20. at 9:00.

content:
79 78 The sign means “ Visitors do not go in ” . U nit 9 U nit 10 Do not use a mobile phone . talk. fish. pick flowers. smoke . What’s your hobby ? My hobby is collecting stamps . collecting old pictures. collecting storybooks. playing chess . playing the violin . taking photos. What’s your hobby, Lingling? My hobby is reading. 
79 78 U nit 11 U nit 12 I’m I feel We’re happy. proud . excited . sorry. angry. sad. shy . The Spring Festival is an important festival in China. People have a reunion dinner together . Children wear new clothes. Children get red packets . They light firecrackers . They watch lion dances. I’m sorry. 
81 80 
81 80
